${modID}:Memory.NAME: Memory
${modID}:Memory.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard up to !M! cards. NL Draw that many cards next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Dual Claw.NAME: Dual Claw
${modID}:Dual Claw.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Echo. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL Dual Claw cards by !M! this combat.

${modID}:Dizzying Strike.NAME: Dizzying Strike
${modID}:Dizzying Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Dazed to your hand.

${modID}:Omnipotent Form.NAME: Omnipotent Form
${modID}:Omnipotent Form.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] [E] [E].
${modID}:Omnipotent Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] [E] [E].

${modID}:Forget.NAME: Forget
${modID}:Forget.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Forget the Pain.NAME: Forget the Pain
${modID}:Forget the Pain.DESCRIPTION: Add a Wound and a *Forget to your hand. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Well-Laid Plans.NAME: Well-Laid Plans
${modID}:Well-Laid Plans.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! card.
${modID}:Well-Laid Plans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! cards.

${modID}:Mind Palace.NAME: Mind Palace
${modID}:Mind Palace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card during combat, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Extra Turn Spell.NAME: Extra Turn Spell
${modID}:Extra Turn Spell.DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn after this one. NL Draw 2 fewer cards at the start of that turn. NL End the turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Spirit Shield Attack.NAME: Spirit Shield Attack
${modID}:Spirit Shield Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Attack card in your hand. Gain !B! Block for each non-Attack card in your hand.

${modID}:Fatal Doubling Attack.NAME: Fatal Doubling Attack
${modID}:Fatal Doubling Attack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, return this to your hand and double its damage.

${modID}:Hand Copying Skill.NAME: Hand Copying Skill
${modID}:Hand Copying Skill.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Add a copy of each card discarded this way to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Hand Damage Power.NAME: Hand Damage Power
${modID}:Hand Damage Power.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each card in your hand.

${modID}:Discard Vuln Attack.NAME: Discard Vuln Attack
${modID}:Discard Vuln Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have discarded a card this turn, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Forget Attack.NAME: Forget Attack
${modID}:Forget Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Forget to your hand.

${modID}:Common Discard Attack.NAME: Common Discard Attack
${modID}:Common Discard Attack.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to 2 cards. NL Deal !D! damage for each card discarded.

${modID}:Empty Double Attack.NAME: Empty Double Attack
${modID}:Empty Double Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have 1 or fewer other cards in hand, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:Discard AOE Attack.NAME: Discard AOE Attack
${modID}:Discard AOE Attack.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies a number of times equal to its cost.

${modID}:AOE Draw Attack.NAME: AOE Draw Attack
${modID}:AOE Draw Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

${modID}:Memory Attack.NAME: Memory Attack
${modID}:Memory Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Memory into your hand.

${modID}:Discardable Defend.NAME: Discardable Defend
${modID}:Discardable Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is discarded, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Forget Defend.NAME: Forget Defend
${modID}:Forget Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Forget to your hand.

${modID}:Card Storing Defend.NAME: Card Storing Defend
${modID}:Card Storing Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL A random card in your hand is ${modID}:Stored.
${modID}:Card Storing Defend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose a card in your hand and ${modID}:Store it.

${modID}:Starting Attack.NAME: Starting Attack
${modID}:Starting Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !${modID}:Magic! less damage for each card in your hand.

${modID}:Starting Defend.NAME: Starting Defend
${modID}:Starting Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your hand +2.
${modID}:Starting Defend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your hand +5.

${modID}:Storage Hologram.NAME: Storage Hologram
${modID}:Storage Hologram.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block. NL Choose a card in your discard pile and ${modID}:Store it.

${modID}:Retain Defend.NAME: Retain Defend
${modID}:Retain Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of this turn, Retain up to 1 card.

${modID}:Hand Strength.NAME: Hand Strength
${modID}:Hand Strength.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every !${modID}:Magic! cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Discard Recur Attack.NAME: Discard Recur Attack
${modID}:Discard Recur Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you discard a card, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:Create Cheap Power.NAME: Create Cheap Power
${modID}:Create Cheap Power.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card, reduce its cost by 1 this turn.
${modID}:Create Cheap Power.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you create a card, reduce its cost by 1 this turn.

${modID}:Overflow.NAME: Overflow
${modID}:Overflow.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your hand becomes full, play a random card in your hand.
${modID}:Overflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever your hand becomes full, play a random card in your hand.

${modID}:Create Reduce Cost.NAME: Create Reduce Cost
${modID}:Create Reduce Cost.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Echo. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each card created this turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Windmill Strike.NAME: Windmill Strike
${modID}:Windmill Strike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, increase its damage by !M! this combat for each card Retained.

${modID}:Retain Cycle Attack.NAME: Retain Cycle Attack
${modID}:Retain Cycle Attack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this card was Retained last turn, draw 1 card.

${modID}:Five Card Scrape.NAME: Five Card Scrape
${modID}:Five Card Scrape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard cards until you have 5 cards in hand.

${modID}:Reorganize.NAME: Reorganize
${modID}:Reorganize.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If this card is discarded or put into ${modID}:Storage, draw 1 card.

${modID}:Unburden.NAME: Unburden
${modID}:Unburden.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to 3 cards. NL Gain [E] for each card beyond the first discarded.
${modID}:Unburden.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard up to 3 cards. NL Gain [E] for each card discarded.

${modID}:Expertise.NAME: Expertise
${modID}:Expertise.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you have !M! cards in hand.

${modID}:Reiterate.NAME: Reiterate
${modID}:Reiterate.DESCRIPTION: Create a copy of a card in your hand. NL It gains Retain. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Reiterate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a copy of a card in your hand. NL It gains Retain.

${modID}:Unceasing Ideas.NAME: Unceasing Ideas
${modID}:Unceasing Ideas.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your hand is empty during your turn, draw 1 card.
${modID}:Unceasing Ideas.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever your hand is empty during your turn, draw 1 card.

${modID}:Evolve.NAME: Evolve
${modID}:Evolve.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status card, draw !M! card.
${modID}:Evolve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status card, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Recollect.NAME: Recollect
${modID}:Recollect.DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of each ${modID}:Stored card.

${modID}:Double Strike.NAME: Double Strike
${modID}:Double Strike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Echo. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ALL *Double *Strike cards in your hand cost 0 this turn.

${modID}:Store Strength.NAME: Store Strength
${modID}:Store Strength.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Store this card. NL When this card leaves ${modID}:Storage, Exhaust it and gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Draw Until Attack.NAME: Draw Until Attack
${modID}:Draw Until Attack.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you draw an Attack. NL ${modID}:Store that card.
${modID}:Draw Until Attack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you draw an Attack.

${modID}:Draw Statuses.NAME: Draw Statuses
${modID}:Draw Statuses.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! random Status or Curse cards from your draw pile into your hand.

${modID}:Retain Hand.NAME: Retain Hand
${modID}:Retain Hand.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card in your hand. NL Retain your hand this turn.

${modID}:Unplayable Block.NAME: Unplayable Block
${modID}:Unplayable Block.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. NL When you draw or discard this card, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Damage Per Card.NAME: Damage Per Card
${modID}:Damage Per Card.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !${modID}:Magic! additional damage for each card in your hand.

${modID}:Exhaust Dexterity.NAME: Exhaust Dexterity
${modID}:Exhaust Dexterity.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable, Retain. NL When your hand is full, Exhaust this and gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:Locking Draw.NAME: Locking Draw
${modID}:Locking Draw.DESCRIPTION: Draw 4 cards and choose !M!. You cannot play the others this turn.

${modID}:Amnesia.NAME: Amnesia
${modID}:Amnesia.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a *Forget into your hand.
${modID}:Amnesia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, add a *Forget into your hand.

${modID}:Discard Power.NAME: Discard Power
${modID}:Discard Power.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Rare Store Attack.NAME: Rare Store Attack
${modID}:Rare Store Attack.DESCRIPTION: If you have no other cards in hand, deal !D! damage. NL Otherwise, ${modID}:Store this card.

${modID}:Plan Ahead.NAME: Plan Ahead
${modID}:Plan Ahead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card.

${modID}:Last Stand.NAME: Last Stand
${modID}:Last Stand.DESCRIPTION: While you have 3 or fewer cards in hand, you have !M! additional Strength.

${modID}:Damage Per Created.NAME: Damage Per Created
${modID}:Damage Per Created.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals additional damage equal to the number of cards created this combat.

${modID}:Discard Hand Attack.NAME: Discard Hand Attack
${modID}:Discard Hand Attack.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Deal !D! damage for each card discarded this way.

${modID}:Hand Size Increase.NAME: Hand Size Increase
${modID}:Hand Size Increase.DESCRIPTION: Increase your maximum hand size by !M! this combat. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Hand Full Defend.NAME: Hand Full Defend
${modID}:Hand Full Defend.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can only be played if your hand is full. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Deja Vu.NAME: Deja Vu
${modID}:Deja Vu.DESCRIPTION: The first card you draw each turn has ${modID}:Echo.
${modID}:Deja Vu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first 2 cards you draw each turn have ${modID}:Echo.

${modID}:Extra Draw.NAME: Extra Draw
${modID}:Extra Draw.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! additional cards each turn. NL At the end of your turn, take 1 damage for each card in your hand.

${modID}:Super Gamble.NAME: Super Gamble
${modID}:Super Gamble.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards plus !M!.

${modID}:Mind Control.NAME: Mind Control
${modID}:Mind Control.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Echo. NL ALL enemies lose 2 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Strike Hand.NAME: Strike Hand
${modID}:Strike Hand.DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with ${modID}:Echoes of Strikes.
${modID}:Strike Hand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with ${modID}:Echoes of upgraded Strikes.

${modID}:X Discard.NAME: X Discard
${modID}:X Discard.DESCRIPTION: Discard X cards. NL Gain [E] if a card was discarded. NL Draw X additional cards next turn.
${modID}:X Discard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard X+1 cards. NL Gain [E] [E] if a card was discarded. NL Draw X additional cards next turn.

${modID}:Return Discard Draw.NAME: Return Discard Draw
${modID}:Return Discard Draw.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your draw pile and a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Store Next Card.NAME: Store Next Card
${modID}:Store Next Card.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next card you play this turn is Stored.

${modID}:Full Weak Attack.NAME: Full Weak Attack
${modID}:Full Weak Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have 6 or more cards in hand, apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:Staying Power.NAME: Staying Power
${modID}:Staying Power.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Retained, increase its base damage and Block by !M!.

${modID}:Retain Ping Attack.NAME: Retain Ping Attack
${modID}:Retain Ping Attack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Brutal Slash.NAME: Brutal Slash
${modID}:Brutal Slash.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage and apply ${modID}:Trauma equal to the number of cards in your hand.
${modID}:Brutal Slash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage and apply ${modID}:Trauma equal to the number of cards in your hand +3.

${modID}:Torture.NAME: Torture
${modID}:Torture.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's ${modID}:Trauma, then ${modID}:Awaken it. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Torture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's ${modID}:Trauma, then ${modID}:Awaken it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AOE Trauma.NAME: AOE Trauma
${modID}:AOE Trauma.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Trauma to ALL enemies. NL Store this card.

${modID}:Unending Torment.NAME: Unending Torment
${modID}:Unending Torment.DESCRIPTION: Awakening ${modID}:Trauma does not cause the enemy to lose their ${modID}:Trauma.

${modID}:Retain Trauma.NAME: Retain Trauma
${modID}:Retain Trauma.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Trauma. NL If the enemy's ${modID}:Trauma was not ${modID}:awoken, return this to your hand.

${modID}:Create Dread.NAME: Create Dread
${modID}:Create Dread.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Trauma. NL This does not ${modID}:Awaken the enemy's ${modID}:Trauma.
